All web tutorials, vlogs, and podcasts are licensed for use by their respective authors under the guidelines of [CC-BY-SA 4.0](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/) unless otherwise noted.

***

### Web Tutorials

[ArcPro Model Builder](https://unstable-ground-consulting.github.io/Landslide-Susceptibility/How-To/)
:   Check out this simple guide to using ArcGIS Pro's ModelBuilder by Jake Werner.

[How to Basemap in Q](https://slopeconsulting.github.io/)
:   Check out this tutorial by Sean O'Rahilly on how to add a basemap to a map project in QGIS.

[Spatial Joins](https://tunisda.weebly.com/tutorials.html)
:   Check out this tutorial by Ian, Morgan, and Michele on how to join crime offenses to different neighborhoods in Pittsburgh, PA.

[Tabulate Intersection](https://tabintersectionadvgis.weebly.com/)
:   Check out this tutorial by Lauren Kohout on how to use the Tabulate Intersection geoprocessing tool to calculate the amount of intersection between two feature classes or variables of interest.
